arStrings.szText:
Your {c_important}Conjuration{/c} Skills have a {c_number}[{SF_0} * 100|%x||%|]{/c} reduced Cooldown or Mana cost.  They also deal bonus damage equal to {c_number}[{SF_1} * 100|%x|]{/c} of the total amount of your Bonus Damage with Fire, Lightning, and Cold.

Current Bonus: {c_number}[{SF_5} * 100|x%|]{/c}
